main event: An airline pilot observed an oval-shaped object in the sky above Chicago, Illinois for 30 minutes on June 23, 1966.
interesting points: The object was white and appeared similar to a star,The object was observed 25 degrees above the horizon,The sighting was conducted using binoculars,The observer reported no sound emitted by the object,The object disappeared after drifting for half an hour.
sighted object: oval-shaped white object resembling a star
witness description: Ernest M. Heglar, an airline pilot
